name: .ARPROJ

instructions: You can open an ARPROJ file in Spark AR Studio (cross-platform). To do so, select File â†’ Open... from the program's menu bar. Keep in mind, however, that:
You must have a Facebook account to use Spark AR Studio
Your ARPROJ file will open correctly only if it is stored in a project directory, alongside the project's included assets
